title: Election Day Update: Robocalls and Omens 11.3.20
itunes:title: Election Day Update: Robocalls and Omens 11.3.20
description:
In episode 750, Jack and Miles are joined by comedian and rapper Open Mike Eagle to discuss some good news when it comes to ballot counting, Trump claiming he will declare victory only if there is victory, robocalls, when to expect election results, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. November Surprise: Fewer Ballots Rejected by Election Officials
  2. Trump Says He’ll Declare Victory ‘Only When There’s Victory’: ‘No Reason To Play Games’
  3. Suspicious robocall campaign warning people to ‘stay home’ spooks voters nationwide
  4. Election results timeline: how the night unfolded
  5. Forget the Exit Polls, Watch Florida, Ignore Pennsylvania
  6. I’m Here To Remind You That Trump Can Still Win
  7. Open Mike Eagle Turned a Very Bad Year Into a Very Honest Album
  8. WATCH: Tierra Whack – Wasteland (Audio)

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
